title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, gather requirements, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the backend, frontend, and database components. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Define the communication protocols and data flow between components. Identify potential third-party services or libraries to be integrated. Ensure proper separation of concerns and modular design for maintainability and extensibility. Address data privacy and anonymity concerns. Plan for monitoring, logging, error handling mechanisms, and data backup/recovery strategies.

title: Develop Backend Services
description: Implement the backend services for handling survey data, user authentication, and other server-side functionality.

title: Develop Frontend User Interface
description: Build the frontend user interface for creating and responding to surveys, as well as viewing results.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for survey data and user information.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and protects user anonymity and data privacy.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the application.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation for developers, administrators, and end-users.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Perform thorough testing of the application, including functional, security, and performance testing.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Storage
